title: Prices Like These WONT LAST LONG!
posting_body: Want more info on this unit?
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 703 Sq.

Westridge Apartments in Aurora, Colorado is spread over 12 meticulously landscaped acres along the 66 mile Highline Canal Trail; which has become a reputable path for hikers, joggers, cyclists, bird watchers and others who yearn for a slice of the outdoors in the middle of a city.
You'll be wonderfully close to many nearby attractions including the historical Delaney Farm, the Aurora History Museum and the 5 Golf Courses within 5 miles!
Buckley Air Force Base and the Community College of Aurora are only minutes away.
Enjoy an easy drive to Denver International Airport or shop 'til you drop at the nearby Town Center at Aurora.
Our welcoming neighborhood will make you feel at home, and our unprecedented commitment to service will keep you happy to live here, long after you move in.

All of our one, two and three bedroom apartments are newly renovated and feature contemporary GE and Frigidaire stainless steel appliance packages; which include a self-cleaning oven, frost free refrigerator with ice maker, dishwasher, and an over the counter microwave.
Your new home will also have a beautiful luxury look with espresso cabinetry, upgraded lighting, two-tone paint with crown molding, and brushed nickel finishes.

Our residents enjoy our exceptional views of the Rocky Mountains in apartments that feature sunny over-sized windows, central heat and air conditioning, high-speed internet capability, and the convenience of a washer/dryer set in every home.
Every apartment also has a private patio or balcony and with limited access to each building, which can only be gained by key or code.

Just outside your door you'll find lush, mature landscaping, and a beautiful clubhouse with money saving amenities: a state of the art fitness center; a resident business center complete with free wireless internet access, printer, and fax; a refreshing seasonal pool; and a playground for the young, and young at heart.
We are also a pet friendly community with plenty of room for your furry friends to roam.
Come visit us in person; we'll be happy to show you around.
Our leasing office is conveniently open from 9am to 6pm Monday through Friday and from 10am to 4pm on Saturdays.
We invite you to preview our community by viewing our photo gallery.
Call or email today to schedule a personalized tour of our community.
Visit Westridge Apartments today and experience the luxury, location and convenience that will make you love where you live!
- Easy Access to Towne Center at Aurora
- Walking Bridge to Highline Canal Trail
- Located on the RTD Bus-line and Major Highways
- Easy Access to DIA and Buckley Air Force Base
- Easy Access Community College of Aurora
Please contact us for turn by turn directions

Restricted dog breeds: Pit Bulls, Rottweiler's, Presa Canario, German Shepherds, Huskies, Malamutes, Dobermans, Chowchows, St. Bernard's, Great Danes, Akitas, Terriers (Staffordshire) and American Bull dogs, Karelian Bear dog.
Any hybrid or mixed breed of one of the aforementioned breeds.
Exotic Animals: Reptiles (snakes, iguanas), Ferrets, Skunks, Raccoons, Squirrels, Rabbits, or Birds (parrots, cockatiels macaws).- Weight Limited of 65 lbs.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
